entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
